name: unconsciously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 without being aware of what you are doing: He may be unconsciously looking for a mother figure. Young managers are either consciously or unconsciously uncomfortable with hiring older workers. See
unconscious
More examplesFewer examplesUnconsciously my lips murmured, "Just be quiet."You should be aware of the messages you may unconsciously be sending to other people.I like things to happen more unconsciously.
